history.proof: split. - intros H. split. + destruct x, y; simpl in *; try contradiction. * strivial use: Rabs_def2. * auto. + hauto depth: 4 use: is_finite_correct, Rbar_mult_0_l, Rbar_le_not_lt, Rbar_opp_le, Rbar_plus_0_r, Rbar_mult_opp_r, Rbar_opp_real, Rbar_finite_eq, Rbar_lt_le, Rbar_opp_eq, Rbar_inv_opp, Rbar_not_le_lt, Ropp_0, Rbar_opp_involutive, Rabs_lt_between, Rbar_plus_opp, Rbar_mult_0_r, Rbar_le_antisym unfold: Rbar_inv, real, Rbar_abs, is_finite, Rabs, Rbar_lt, Rbar_opp. - destruct x, y; simpl in *; try contradiction. * strivial use: Rabs_def1. * sfirstorder depth: 3. * sfirstorder depth: 3. * intros [H1 H2]. sfirstorder depth: 3. * sfirstorder depth: 3. * sfirstorder depth: 3. * sfirstorder depth: 3. * sfirstorder depth: 3. * sfirstorder depth: 3.

original: split. - intros H. split. + destruct x, y; simpl in *; try contradiction. * apply Rbar_lt_not_le in H; auto. * auto. * apply Rbar_lt_not_eq in H; auto. + destruct x, y; simpl in *; try contradiction. * apply Rbar_lt_le in H; auto. * apply Rbar_lt_not_eq in H; auto. * auto. - intros [H1 H2]. destruct x, y; simpl in *; try contradiction. + apply Rbar_lt_le in H1. apply Rbar_lt_trans with (y := x); auto. + apply Rbar_lt_le in H2. apply Rbar_lt_trans with (y := x); auto. + apply Rbar_lt_le in H1. apply Rbar_lt_le in H2. apply Rbar_lt_trans with (y := x); auto.
